channel.title: Varimat Calling on BMMB 554 | 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Varimat Calling on BMMB 554 | 2018

item.title: Variant calling: Pooled and Haploid systems
item.description: The majority of life on Earth is non-diploid and represented by prokaryotes, viruses and their derivatives such as our own mitochondria or plant’s chloroplasts. In non-diploid systems allele frequencies can range anywhere between 0 and 100% and there could be multiple (not just two) alleles per locus.
